knimeNode.name: Multilevel Thresholding
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs an efficient multilevel thresholding on an input image. This node was implemented by Markus Friedrich (University of Konstanz, markus.friedrich@uni-konstanz.de).

fullDescription.intro: By now, only the Otsu method is implemented in an efficient way using lookup-tables.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The method to use for thresholding.
Important parameters. Number of levels specifies the number of levels in the output image. Number of intensities states, how many bins are used in the input image's histogram.
